content: hook 4mm & 2 strands of white yarn row 1 chain 2 half_double_crochet in 2nd bb chain 1 turn 1 row 2 2hdc in st chain 1 turn 2 row 3 half_double_crochet in 1st st 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 3 row 4 2hdc in 1st st half_double_crochet in nxt st 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 5 row 5 2hdc in 1st st half_double_crochet in nxt st fp double_crochet in nxt st half_double_crochet in nxt st 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 7 row 6 2hdc in 1st st half_double_crochet in nxt2st bp double_crochet in nxt st half_double_crochet in nxt2sts 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 9 row 7 2hdc in 1st st half_double_crochet in nxt st chain 4 half_double_crochet in nxt2sts fp double_crochet in nxt st half_double_crochet in nxt2sts chain 4 half_double_crochet in nxt st 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 11 row 8 2hdc in 1st st half_double_crochet in nxt2sts 3hdc around the chain not into half_double_crochet in nxt2sts bp double_crochet in nxt st half_double_crochet in nxt2sts 3hdc around chain half_double_crochet in nxt2sts 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 19 row 9 2hdc in 1st st half_double_crochet in nxt8sts fp double_crochet in nxt st half_double_crochet in nxt8sts 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 21 row 10 placing a st marker in 1st st half_double_crochet in 1st 10sts bp double_crochet placing a st marker in the 1st of these 10 half_double_crochet in nxt10sts chain 1 turn 21 do not fo we will be making the side & center pieces for the eye openings the row counts will start at 1 then return to regular count once they are completed right side section when front of mask is facing you row 1 hdc2tog half_double_crochet in nxt3sts half_double_crochet/decrease chain 1 turn 5 you should have 2sts remaining before st marker row 2 half_double_crochet in 1st & nxt4sts chain 1 turn 5 row 3 half_double_crochet in 1st 4sts 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 6 row 4 half_double_crochet in 1st & nxt5sts chain 1 turn 6 row 5 half_double_crochet in 1st 5sts 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 7 row 6 half_double_crochet in 1st & nxt6sts 7 fo center section with outside/front of mask facing you go back to row 10 join with a slip_stitch in marked st closest to the center row 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as join fp double_crochet in nxt st half_double_crochet in nxt st chain 1 turn 3 row 2 2hdc in 1st st bp double_crochet in nxt st 2hdc in nxt st chain 1 turn 5 row 3
